categories: Category:Articles with elements from unlicensed sources

nodes.text: Neshtab was a planet of snowy ice plains located in the Inner Rim region of the galaxy.

During the Waymancy Storm of 7811 BBY, the Neshtabine nest was associated with the Waymancy Hollow, fighting against the Galactic Republic. It was eventually routed by the Republic Rocket-Jumpers at Tantara.
An Imperial factory on Neshtab was creating stormtrooper droids until it was destroyed by Luke Skywalker after the Battle of Hoth.
8t88, with a dark trooper head, was later spotted on Neshtab after the Battle of Endor.
